remarks: Base set of a structure product.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdsbas $p |- ( ph -> B = X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d P x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
